name: Blue & Red Paper-route Tote
description: Modelled after your childhood paper-route bags, you will love the go anywhere style of this body forming tote with internal zippered pouch and grommets to secure your favorite items.
features: 17” x 15” body with 40” strap. One interior pocket with zipper closure.  Two grommeted tabs (used for attaching keys, light fobs, or other items purchased separately).

name: Denim Glasses Case
description: Protect and secure sunglasses, reading glasses, or safety glasses from any surface with a fully lined glasses case secured with a zippered closure.  Use the functional case lining to clean your lenses without scratches.
features: 8.5” x 3.5” body. One zippered closure. Lining made from upcycled materials specifically designed for cleaning glasses.

name: Red Sunglasses Case
description: Protect and secure sunglasses, reading glasses, or safety glasses from any surface with a fully lined glasses case secured with a zippered closure.  Use the functional case lining to clean your lenses without scratches.
features: 8.5” x 3.5” body. One zippered closure. Lining made from upcycled materials specifically designed for cleaning glasses.

name: Denim Zippered Pouches
description: Protect and secure your favorite items from harsh conditions with a zippered pouch ideal for containing a range of items. From credit cards for shoppers to crayons for artists, only your imagination limits the use of these zippered pouches.

name: Red Zippered Pouches
description: Protect and secure your favorite items from harsh conditions with a zippered pouch ideal for containing a range of items. From credit cards for shoppers to crayons for artists, only your imagination limits the use of these zippered pouches.

name: Natural Delicates Hanger
description: On top of a solid wood body, the hand-made crochet covers keep delicate fabrics from sliding off.  Do you have a classic blouse, an inherited treasure, a favorite silky strappy dress worth keeping forever?  These hangers will hold on to your favorite items as long as you do.
features: 17.5” x 7.5” wood frame hanger with adjustable metal hook. One hand-made crochet cover, pre-attached.

features: 17.5” x 7.5” wood frame hanger with adjustable metal hook. One hand-made crochet cover, pre-attached.

name: Oil Rubbed Bronze Towel Hook
description: Made with upcycled housewares, these towel hooks offer a cozy addition to any wet space for various sized towels, washcloths, or hair covers.
features: 9” x 4” hand-made wood frame with three hand-painted daisy drawer knobs.

name: White Daisy Towel Hooks
description: Made with upcycled housewares, these towel hooks offer a cozy addition to any wet space for various sized towels, washcloths, or hair covers.
features: 9” x 4” hand-made wood frame with three hand-painted daisy drawer knobs.

name: Pinecone Wreath
description: Every year we do a limited edition miniature pine cone wreath as part of our seasonal offerings.  Made from the abandoned cones of a California Redwood on our private property, these pine cone wreaths are 8” in diameter and a wonderful addition to seasonal decorations for windows, doors, trees, and fireplaces.
features: Hand-stitched 8” wreath made from California Redwood cones abandoned on private property in Monterey, California.
